TikTok is a fun and addicting app, but it has a hate speech and safety problem. I know there's too many reports for them to keep up with, but more security features like Instagram and Twitch has would make it a safer environment. Tik tok is a great platform. Initially I thought it was only young girls dancing. However, there's a ton of other content: political views, sport, how to stuff, comedy, conversation starters, art. Such a variety. The app itself could have more features or be more intuitive on how to use it. I find what you can do with it a little limiting. But it's totally worth having and very entertaining.
